forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Thunder possible. High 16C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 59F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 50F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 58F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 59F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.
